name: Balanced Meal
description:
This game was made during the Global game jam 2014.

In this game the player controls a formless being which is slowly dying from starvation. The main objective of the game is to feed from other beings in order to survive. However, if the player decides to consume more than they need, the beings will become scarce, resulting on the death of the main character, so sensibility is adviced.

Team:

  • de Tezanos Pinto Federico (@FedericoDETP)
  • Espinosa Sergio Federico
  • Gamboa Naon Manuel (@manoloidee)
  • Lombardelli Maria Julieta (@yelomba)
  • Terceros Vargas Walter Adrian
